H0.text: Who was the first Briton to hold a world javelin record. Steve Backley

H1.text: Who was the first Briton to hold a world javelin record. Tessa Sanderson

H2.text: Who was the first Briton to hold a world javelin record. Mick Hill

H3.text: Who was the first Briton to hold a world javelin record. Fatima Whitbread

A4.text: Stephen James Backley formerly held the world record

A5.text: the world record reverted to the 89.58m mark that Backley had set in 1990
